EmailTemplate.subject: Gala Event Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}
I wanted to give you a quick update regarding our "Together" Gala fundraising event. Due to demand, we have changed the date to Saturday March 26, 2011. Please update your calendars, and see the invite below to purchase your tickets for this incredible event!
Please call us at 1-866-432-4464 if you have any questions about this event, would like to purchase tickets over the phone, or if you would like to donate an item for our auction,.
Sincerely,
Christal Earle
Co-founder, Absolute.org
You are invited to our 2011 gala, "Together".
Gourmet food stations, great music, and a night full of Monte Carlo casino-style excitement - all at the Canadian Heritage Warplane Museum! Please join us on Saturday, March 26, 2011 at 6:30 PM for our 2011 Gala, "Together"! Tickets: $125 per person / $900 per table of 8 ** Each ticket includes $25 worth of chips Absolute exists because of hope - for our youth here in Canada and for the global community. You can be a part of making that happen! This is a night to celebrate the difference that we can be making together.
TOGETHER we can give love, bring hope, and see change.
Click here for more information. www.absolute.org/gala
**all proceeds go towards Absolute's programs in Canada and internationally.

Since 2000, together with our socially progressive donors and participants, Absolute.org has sparked hope for the present and purpose for the future through our innovative and experiential programs. Our financial partners and donors experience the power of exponential philanthropy as they enable us to help bring global change today and invest in lives that can continue it tomorrow.
